name: batteryctl
author: Angel Samuel Suesca Rios <suescapsam@gmail.com>
features: Battery status monitoring with watch mode

1.0.1: Optimized sysinfo refresh for Apple Silicon M3 (500ms -> 200ms)
Fixed TDP estimation from 30W to 22W for M3
Implemented macOS power draw detection via system_profiler
Added codegen-units=1 and panic=abort for smaller binary
Upgraded display to Unicode rounded box drawing
Added comprehensive help text with examples to all subcommands
